settings.name: Shrenik Pillai
settings.title: Data Scientist & ML Engineer
settings.summary: Specializing in ML pipelines, data science, and cloud infrastructure with a focus on optimization and pattern recognition. Experienced in architecting scalable solutions using AWS, Python, and modern ML frameworks. Passionate about Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and building end-to-end ML systems.

about.content: I am a dedicated professional aiming to achieve objectives through continuous learning and improvement. Currently pursuing Master's in Business Analytics and AI at UT Dallas, I leverage academic knowledge and work experience to build scalable ML solutions. I uphold a positive and hardworking attitude, being a good team player while helping teams grow and achieve objectives together. Other than coding, I love fitness, helping others in the community, and exploring new technologies.

items.description: Architected scalable pipelines in high-stakes Mondelez production environment using AWS, Python, SQL, Docker, and Kubernetes, enhanced data ingestion and modeling process by 5% to deliver insights and optimize cloud deployment. Implemented ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) to address monitoring inefficiencies, boosted operational efficiency by 5%, ensuring data quality and data warehouse stability resulting in improved scalability and reliability.

Developed ML pipelines with TensorFlow, OpenCV, and Azure DevOps for real-time theft detection in security applications, achieved 90% accuracy on datasets using YOLO, integrating cloud-based data modeling and troubleshooting. Optimized neural architectures through A/B testing and collaboration, reduced inference latency by 35%, refined production datasets, demonstrating problem-solving in performance enhancement and cloud system testing.

Led 5+ ML/data science competitions, using Python and SQL to analyze feedback and improve engagement by 25% for 200+ students, fostering collaborative problem-solving and providing insights in group or team discussions. Collaborated with industry experts and mentors on model deployment and experimentation methodologies, demonstrating strong verbal and written communication skills.

items.title: Lie Detection System
items.description: Built supervised learning models with TensorFlow on 10,000+ images to analyze facial cues in AI research. Designed production pipeline with <100ms inference latency using A/B testing framework and explainability techniques. Achieved 85% accuracy using Random Forest, SVM, and neural networks with AWS deployment.

items.title: Facial Expression Recognition
items.description: Implemented FER system containing three key steps: feature extraction, dimensionality reduction, and classification. Built using deep learning techniques to accurately detect and classify human emotions from facial images in real-time.

items.title: AI Hand PoseNet
items.description: Developed hand tracking system employing machine learning to infer 21 3D landmarks of a hand from just a single frame. Implemented real-time hand gesture recognition with high accuracy for interactive applications.

items.title: Person and Car Detection
items.description: Implemented object detection system using Haar Cascade classifier for detecting cars and persons in images and video streams. Optimized for real-time processing with high detection accuracy.

items.title: Heart Disease Prediction
items.description: Developed machine learning classification model to predict heart disease through comprehensive data science lifecycle. Implemented feature engineering, model training, and evaluation to achieve high prediction accuracy for medical diagnosis support.

items.institution: The University of Texas at Dallas
items.degree: Master of Business Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (AI)
items.details: GPA: 3.50/4.00 | Relevant Coursework: Recommendation Systems, Experimentation Design, Data Visualization

items.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Electronics Engineering
items.details: GPA: 3.34/4.00 (8.01 CGPA) | Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning, Data Science, Statistical Analysis, Data Structures and Algorithms | CodeChef 3-star Rating

items.title: Introduction to TensorFlow for AI, ML and Deep Learning

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Feel free to get in touch with me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be a part of your visions. Email me with any questions or inquiries. I'll be happy to answer your questions and set up a meeting with you.
